required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics, and Hematopoietic Stem Cell Mobilization of TG-0054 Alone or in Combination With G-CSF in Patients With Multiple Myeloma, Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma or Hodgkin Disease

brief_summary.textblock: This Phase II study is to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics, and Hematopoietic Stem Cell Mobilization of TG-0054 alone or in combination with G-CSF in Patients with Multiple Myeloma, Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma or Hodgkin Disease.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients Achieving the CD34+ Hematopoietic Stem Cell (HSC) Mobilization Target of ≧2.5×1000000 Cells/kg
primary_outcome.description: Patients were all with multiple myeloma (MM), Non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL) or Hodgkin disease (HD). Number of patients who mobilized the targeted total number of CD34+ cells within a maximum of 4 leukapheresis sessions in study arm 1 and arm 3. Patients in arm 1 followed administration of TG-0054 (3.14 mg/kg) alone and leukapheresis start from study day 1. Patients in arm 3 followed administration of TG-0054 (3.14 mg/kg) combined with granulocyte colony-stimulating factor (G-CSF) and leukapheresis start from study day 8.

secondary_outcome.measure: the Average Number of Leukapheresis Sessions
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the average number of leukapheresis sessions required to collect 2.5 x10^6 CD34+ cells/kg.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose(-2 to 0 h),2, 4 and 6 hr after dosing.
secondary_outcome.description: Calculate the median total CD34+ cell counts across all leukapheresis sessions following TG 0054 administration alone and in combination with G-CSF mobilization in order to evaluate the pharmacodynamics (PD) of TG-0054 by determining circulating CD34+ cell counts in peripheral blood.

intervention.description: 3.14 mg/kg TG-0054 administrated via 15-min IV infusion(allow a maximum of four leukapheresis sessions)

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Duration of the Study: This study will consist of a 14-day screening period, a 2- to 11-day treatment period, and a 7-day follow-up period. Number of Patients: Approximately 12 treatment evaluable patients will be enrolled in this study. Study Location: Single site in US.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
